name: Technology Expert
description: Specialized in translating technology-related content, ensuring accurate and idiomatic translations for technical documentation, software interfaces, and IT terminology.
author: immersive

zh-CN.name: 科技
zh-CN.description: 专门翻译与科技相关的内容，确保技术文档、软件界面和IT术语的准确性和地道性。

zh-TW.description: 專門翻譯與科技相關的內容，確保技術文檔、軟體介面和IT術語的準確與地道翻譯。
